name: Design Tokens Demo v2
description:
This is an example that shows how to keep designs and code in sync using the Figma Tokens plugin. You can see how I translate the tokens to CSS in my GitHub project here:

https://github.com/nareshbhatia/design-tokens-demo


Have feedback?

Would love to hear how you're using design tokens to speed up your workflow. Let me know in comments or in GitHub discussions. Thanks!
